text: One of the kettukazhcha's at Aswathi festival Valiyakulangara Devi Temple is located about 5 km from Haripad and 4 km from Thrikkunnappuzha. It is located 3 km from the National Waterway-3 as well as from the National Highway-47. The major festival is the Aswathi festival in Feb-March, famous for the Fireworks show and the Kettukaazcha (procession of chariots). 'Kettukazhcha' displays sculpted and decorated forms of six temple cars known as 'Kuthiras', five Therus' (Chariots ) and icons of Bhima and Hanuman. ==See also== * Temples of Kerala ==External links== Category:Hindu temples in Alappuzha district Category:Devi temples in Kerala
title: Valiyakulangara Devi Temple
